summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2548, for the improvement of Pike Street form Pike Place to the waterfront, all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of an overhead bridge, under Ordinance No. 26355 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
